Sorry, I didn't get that. Here's some general instructions. Type:
HELLO - any time you want to chat.
BYE - if you ever want to end the chat.
BACK - if you want to go back to a previous menu.
REGISTER_YUTE - if you want to restart the registration process.
COUNSELLOR - if you want to speak directly to the NFPB counsellor.

This platform only recognizes text/numbers 🤭, so please don't send emojis, images, videos or voicenotes.

Ready to chat? Type HELLO 🙂
